## toLinear variable

Inline function. Converts sRGB color term (1D-4D) to linear space via `pow(rgb, GAMMA)`<!-- -->, where gamma is hardcoded to 2.2. For vec4 args, the `w` component (alpha) remains unchanged.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
toLinear: <T extends Prim>(x: Term<T>) => import("@thi.ng/shader-ast").FnCall<T>
```
